Title.evidence: randomized trials of subjects with a degenerative meniscal tear

Trial_Design.evidence: One hundred and sixty-four subjects were randomized to and received APM and 177 were randomized to PT

Participants.evidence: subjects ≥45 years old who had mild-to-moderate osteoarthritis and a degenerative meniscal tear

Intervention.evidence: APM with PT versus PT alone

Objective.evidence: We sought to identify factors associated with crossing over to APM and to compare pain relief

Number_Randomised.evidence: One hundred and sixty-four subjects were randomized to and received APM and 177 were randomized to PT

Number_Analysed.evidence: 81% of subjects who crossed over to APM and 82% of those randomized to APM had an improvement
